tool_description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)
title: Dezgo

api_list.name: /upscale
api_list.description:
Upscale an image by a factor of 2
This AI attempts to preserve contrasted edges and details as much as possible, producing a sharper image than simple interpolation methods. The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `image`
(see the "About" section for more details)

parameters.name: image
parameters.description:
The image to upscale

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 2048` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

api_list.name: /image2image
api_list.description:
Edit an existing image to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ
values: a serene mountain landscape at sunrise, photorealistic
cyberpunk city street at night, neon lights, rain
portrait of a medieval knight in armor, oil painting style
futuristic spaceship flying over a desert planet
a cute kitten playing with yarn, cartoon style
underwater coral reef with colorful fish, vibrant colors
a fantasy castle on a floating island, detailed
steampunk robot with gears and steam, highly detailed
a cozy cabin in snowy forest, warm lighting
abstract geometric shapes with bright colors

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft
values: out of frame, cut off, cropped

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`
  - `texture_diffusion`
  - `trinart_2_0`
  - `tshirt_diffusion`
  - `vectorartz_diffusion`
  - `vintedois_diffusion_v0_1`
  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`
parameters.default: epic_diffusion_1_1

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description:
How strongly the original image should be altered (from subtle to drastic changes)
From 0.0 to 1.0

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 1`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

api_list.name: /inpainting
api_list.description:
Modify a part of an image (using a mask) to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ
values: a serene mountain landscape at sunrise, photorealistic
a futuristic city skyline with flying cars, cyberpunk style
a cute kitten playing with a ball of yarn, watercolor painting
an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ
a fantasy dragon soaring over a medieval castle, vibrant colors
a close-up portrait of a smiling elderly woman, black and white photo
a tropical beach with palm trees and crystal clear water, sunset
a steampunk robot holding a bouquet of flowers, detailed illustration
a magical forest with glowing mushrooms and fairies, night scene
a vintage car parked on a cobblestone street, autumn setting

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

values: binary image 256x256 pixels with white circle in center
binary image 512x512 pixels with white square in top-left corner
binary image 128x128 pixels with white diagonal stripe
binary image 1024x1024 pixels with white star shape in center
binary image 64x64 pixels with white horizontal band
binary image 256x256 pixels with white irregular blob shape
binary image 512x512 pixels with white vertical stripe
binary image 128x128 pixels with white checkerboard pattern
binary image 256x256 pixels with white heart shape in center
binary image 512x512 pixels with white crescent moon shape

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

values: JPEG image 512x512 pixels, photo of a cityscape
JPEG image 128x128 pixels, icon style image

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft
values: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft
low resolution, pixelated, noisy background, distorted colors
overexposed, underexposed, lens flare, motion blur
dark shadows, harsh lighting, unbalanced composition
monochrome, dull colors, lack of detail
cluttered background, distracting elements, poor framing
overly saturated, unnatural skin tones, plastic look

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

api_list.name: /text2image
api_list.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ
values: a serene mountain landscape at sunrise, photorealistic
cyberpunk city street at night, neon lights, rain, detailed
a fantasy dragon flying over a medieval castle, digital painting
portrait of a young woman with flowers in her hair, soft lighting
a futuristic spaceship landing on an alien planet, concept art
a cute puppy playing in a garden, bright and colorful
an ancient temple hidden in a dense jungle, mystical atmosphere
a bustling market scene in a steampunk world, vibrant colors
a close-up of a butterfly on a flower, macro photography style
a surreal dreamscape with floating islands and waterfalls

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft
values: out of frame, cropped, cut off

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**

api_list.name: /info
api_list.description: Get information about the Dezgo API (such as available models).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dezgo.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dezgo.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

id.description: Unique identifier of the model (used to specify the model in the API)

name.description: Human readable name of the model

triggers.description:
If set, indicates that the model was trained to react to these specific trigger prompts (for example with Dreambooth finetuning).
Prepend your prompt with one of these triggers to use this model's specific behavior.

functions.description: The set of functions that this model can perform.

description.description: Human readable description of the model

paymentMethods.description: Information about the available payment methods

schema.description: Describe global information about the Dezgo API.

schema.description: Describe global information about the Dezgo API.

a portrait of a smiling elderly woman, oil painting style
a spaceship landing on an alien planet, sci-fi concept art
a peaceful beach with palm trees and clear blue water, photo
a bustling street market in an Asian city, vibrant colors

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

values: binary image of 256x256 pixels with white circle in center
binary image of 512x512 pixels with white square in top-left
binary image of 128x128 pixels with white diagonal stripe
binary image of 1024x1024 pixels with white star shape
binary image of 64x64 pixels with white horizontal band
binary image of 256x256 pixels with white checkerboard pattern
binary image of 512x512 pixels with white ellipse in center
binary image of 128x128 pixels with white cross shape
binary image of 256x256 pixels with white irregular blob
binary image of 1024x1024 pixels with white concentric circles

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

values: RGB image of 256x256 pixels, colorful landscape photo
RGB image of 512x512 pixels, cityscape at night
RGB image of 128x128 pixels, close-up flower photo
RGB image of 1024x1024 pixels, detailed fantasy artwork
RGB image of 64x64 pixels, simple geometric pattern
RGB image of 256x256 pixels, portrait photo with neutral background
RGB image of 512x512 pixels, abstract digital art
RGB image of 128x128 pixels, cartoon character drawing
RGB image of 256x256 pixels, black and white architectural photo
RGB image of 1024x1024 pixels, high resolution nature photo

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

api_list.name: /text2image
api_list.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ
values: a serene mountain landscape at sunrise, photorealistic
futuristic city skyline with flying cars, cyberpunk style
a cute kitten playing with a ball of yarn, digital painting
ancient forest with mystical creatures, fantasy art
a spaceship landing on a distant planet, highly detailed
portrait of a medieval knight in shining armor, realistic
underwater coral reef teeming with colorful fish, vibrant
a cozy cabin in the snowy woods, warm lighting
a dragon soaring over a castle at sunset, epic scene
abstract geometric shapes with neon colors, modern art

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft
values: out of frame, cropped, cut off

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`
